title: Wildfires
text: The challenges faced are real and urgent.

title: Spirit Island
text: As we traveled along our journey, we met Dr. Rebekah Ingram, an expert at Carleton University on Indigenous languages, who said, when discussing the meaning and origins of Indigenous words, “The way that I had been thinking was based exclusively on the viewpoint of the world that I did not even know that I had; we were not being critical of our own information sources.”

title: Kali and Omar on the Piano
